borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">The outbuilding
hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of
the application dwellinghouse (1</span>2 The Close, Chadwell Heath, Romford,
Barking And Dagenham, RM6 6XL<span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">).
The building&nbsp;shall not be used for purposes conflicting with the use of
the property as a single dwellinghouse, and in particular it shall not be used
as a separate unit of accommodation.</span><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">For clarity all
external&nbsp;material used in the construction of the development subject to
his application should match the materials&nbsp;used&nbsp;in the existing
dwellinghouse.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
description: Retrospective application for the construction of an outbuilding in the rear garden
